name: Ghost Visor 3000
description:
Ghost Visor 3000 is an experimental Oculus Passthrough game inspired by Luigi's Mansion. It's a VR game that allows you to freely walk inside your room! Set your room scale HUGE. Grab your vacuum and flashlight. Let's go hunt for ghosts!

This game has only been tested on Oculus Quest 2.

Creators

Jack Chen and Leslie Zeng

Installation

1. Download Ghost Visor 3000.apk

2. Use Sidequest to upload the apk to your Oculus Quest 2

3. Go to Oculus Apps (All) -> Unknown sources-> Ghost Visor 3000

Control

A (Right Thumb) - Start the Game, Turn On/Off the Flashlight

X (Left Thumb) - Hold to Open the Vacuum
